snippet: Charles Fried, a former solicitor general, chides President Obama in connection with the Defense of Marriage Act court case.
abstract: Letter from former solicitor general Charles Fried comments on March 28 article regarding arguments before Supreme Court on constitutionality of Defense of Marriage Act.
